title: Hummelstown Juvenile dead from gunshot wound
content:
DAUPHIN COUNTY, Pa. – Borough police responded to a home in the 200 block of West Main Street in Hummelstown Borough shortly before 6 pm Thursday. They discovered a juvenile male suffering from a gunshot wound. The county coroner was called to the home a short time later.
Police are withholding the name of the victim pending the notification of next of kin. They say their investigation continues.
